commands.name: create-graph
commands.title: Create Graph
commands.subtitle: Create a graph from
commands.description: Build a new graph from edges or templates

commands.name: saved-graph
commands.title: Saved Graph
commands.subtitle: List of saved graphs
commands.description: Shows a list of saved graph

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
